headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.paypal.com https://www.paypalobjects.com https://www.sandbox.paypal.com https://www.gstatic.com https://www.gstatic.cn; connect-src 'self' https://www.paypal.com https://www.sandbox.paypal.com https://api-m.paypal.com https://api-m.sandbox.paypal.com https://firestore.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://www.paypal.com https://www.paypalobjects.com https://www.sandbox.paypal.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.paypal.com https://www.sandbox.paypal.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com;
